channel.title: Help with jdk 5.0 [i feel so stupid :(]
channel.description:
well, i have been trying for a week or so to start up a hamachi server with pimpscape to start off with, i read the famour tutorial and it as you all should know u need JDK 5.0 or 6.0 which i cant get both of! i try to follow the link set on the tut. and it takes me to the SE downloads page, i download the installation and when i try to install it doesnt work! it says preparing to install and vanishes, and also on JDK 6.0 it downloaded and installed onto my computer and stuff but then when i go to my source it still says that i need JDK but i dont know whether im downloading the right one, it said download just JDK 6.0 but theres only 1 with JDK 6u1 :S i wonder if any1 has ever had this problem :( please help if you know what i mean! Help would be very much appreciated!
also i just tried to download 5.0 and this happened like half way through: http://img513.imageshack.us/img513/7985/scrrrreeeeniejd5.png

item.source: Help with jdk 5.0 [i feel so stupid :(]

item.title: Help with jdk 5.0 [i feel so stupid :(]
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Go here and download JDK 6u1. Then follow my tutorial.

Step 1:
[i]Ok, first we have to set the variables. Click on your Start Menu, then Control Panel, then System, then Advances, And finally Environmental Variables.

So, in short:
Start Menu – Control Panel – System – Advanced – Environmental Variables.[/i]

Step 2:
[i]Ok, now look for the variable named “path” in the list that is shown. Rename it “PATH” and then replace its variable value with this:[i]

c:\Windows\System32\;”C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\

Step 3:
Now make a new variable and name it “classpath.” Add this for its value:

C:\Program Files\Java\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\

Ok, now that you have your variables set, we need to edit the runserver.bat and compile.bat.

Step 4:
[i]Ok, right-click on your compile.bat and click edit. Now replace everything in it with this:[i]

@echo off title Compiler "%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

Step 5:
[i]Ok, now right-click on you runserver.bat and click edit. Now replace everything in it with this:[i]

@echo off title Runserver set java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\java.exe" java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause

You are finished

This looks like Mod Taharok’s Tutorial, but it is edited to work with JDK 6u1.

Read full topic
